name: Bus Driver Simulator - European Minibus
detailed_description:
This minibus is manufactured in Germany since 1995. It was created for various purposes such as comfortable passenger and cargo transportation. The car is being manufactured in different bodies and is being used as minibus, van, refrigerator, special vehicle (like ambulance, mobile office) etc.

What you are going to see in the game is the second generation of a minibus. It was announced in 2006 in Europe. Chromed grille, massive bumpers, new headlights, redesigned wheel arches and bigger air intakes were added, making vehicle look more brutal. Also, ESC, hydraulic power steering and electric window motors were introduced. The most powerful engine had capacity of 3,5 liters and power of 285 HP (210 kW).

This minibus was officially exported to 136 countries.

short_description: This is one of the most popular minibuses in the world! Now you can feel the good acceleration and maneuverability which is unknown to big buses!
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Russian*, Portuguese - Brazil*, French*, Korean*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech*, Italian*, Turkish*, Simplified Chinese*, Romanian*, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later 64-bit os required
  • Processor: 1.9ghz Intel i5-equivalent processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 460 or similar AMD Radeon (no support for onboard cards)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7 or later 64-bit os required
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.9 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
